author: Reid Champlin, Kate Lowenstein
title: 'A Total Joke': The US's Busiest Airport Is Skipping Coronavirus Screenings
description: An undetected coronavirus case passing through the Atlanta airport could have staggering consequences.
content: As Americans abroad frantically flew home before the global coronavirus outbreak trapped them overseas, the Trump administration repeatedly assured both the travelers and the American public that every possible step was being taken to ensure the virus was det… [+7990 chars]
